LoginPage.title: Login to your Account
LoginPage.toastErrorDescription: Please check your credentials and try again.
LoginPage.toastSuccessDescription: You have been successfully logged in.
LoginPage.toastOtpInvalidDescription: The OTP code is incorrect. Please try again.
LoginPage.unexpectedErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

DashboardPage.title: Dashboard
DashboardPage.description: An overview of your project's activity.
DashboardPage.loadErrorDescription: Displaying mock data as a fallback. Please ensure your backend endpoint at `/api/admin/dashboard-stats/` is configured correctly.

ModelListPage.name: Name / Title
ModelListPage.deleteConfirm: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the item.
ModelListPage.exportPreparingDescription: Fetching all {totalItems} items... This may take a moment.
ModelListPage.exportReadyDescription: Your {format} file has been generated and is downloading.
ModelListPage.exportFailedDescription: An error occurred while exporting data: {message}

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
SettingsPage.twoFactorEnabled: 2FA is currently enabled on your account.
SettingsPage.scanQrCode: Scan the QR code below with your authenticator app.
SettingsPage.secretKey: Or enter this secret key manually
SettingsPage.twoFactorEnableSuccessDescription: 2FA has been successfully activated on your account.

Time.years: {count, plural, one {# year ago} other {# years ago}}
Time.months: {count, plural, one {# month ago} other {# months ago}}
Time.days: {count, plural, one {# day ago} other {# days ago}}
Time.hours: {count, plural, one {# hour ago} other {# hours ago}}
Time.minutes: {count, plural, one {# minute ago} other {# minutes ago}}
Time.seconds: {count, plural, one {# second ago} other {# seconds ago}}

OtpDialog.title: Enter Verification Code
OtpDialog.description: A verification code has been sent to your authenticator app.

ImportExport.importDescription: Upload a CSV or JSON file to bulk-create items. Make sure the file columns match the model fields.
ImportExport.importSuccessDescription: {count, plural, =0 {No items were imported} one {# item was imported} other {# items were imported}}.

DashboardLayout.signOutSuccessDescription: You have been signed out successfully.

AuthErrorPage.credentialsSigninDescription: The username or password you entered is incorrect. Please double-check your credentials and try again.
AuthErrorPage.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have permission to access this page.
AuthErrorPage.configurationDescription: There is an issue with the server configuration. Please contact an administrator.
AuthErrorPage.defaultDescription: An unexpected error occurred during authentication.

ErrorPage.title: Something went wrong!
ErrorPage.description: An unexpected error occurred. You can try to reload the page.
